name: NextBestAction
description: Execute recommendation strategies, get recommendations, manage recommendation reactions.

deleterecommendationreaction(string).name: deleteRecommendationReaction
deleterecommendationreaction(string).overrideSignature: public static override Void deleteRecommendationReaction(String reactionId)

executestrategy(string,integer,string).name: executeStrategy
executestrategy(string,integer,string).signature: public static ConnectApi.NBARecommendations executeStrategy(String strategyName, Integer maxResults, String contextRecordId)
executestrategy(string,integer,string).overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.NBARecommendations executeStrategy(String strategyName, Integer maxResults, String contextRecordId)

contextrecordid.name: contextRecordId
contextrecordid.description: Name of the strategy. Maximum number of results. Valid values are from 1 to 25. The default is 3. ID of the context record. For example, if the next best action is on a case detail page, the ID of the case.

executestrategy(string,integer,string,bo.name: executeStrategy
executestrategy(string,integer,string,bo.signature: public static ConnectApi.NBARecommendations executeStrategy(String strategyName, Integer maxResults, String contextRecordId, Boolean debugTrace)
executestrategy(string,integer,string,bo.overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.NBARecommendations executeStrategy(String strategyName, Integer maxResults, String contextRecordId, Boolean debugTrace)
executestrategy(string,integer,string,bo.description: Execute a strategy and request a trace.

debugtrace.name: debugTrace
debugtrace.description: Name of the strategy. Maximum number of results. Valid values are from 1 to 25. The default is 3. ID of the context record. For example, if the next best action is on a case detail page, the ID of the case. Specifies whether to return trace and debug information in the response (true) or not (false).

executestrategy(string,connectapi.nbastr.name: executeStrategy
executestrategy(string,connectapi.nbastr.signature: public static ConnectApi.NBARecommendations executeStrategy(String strategyName, ConnectApi.NBAStrategyExecutionInput strategyInput)
executestrategy(string,connectapi.nbastr.overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.NBARecommendations executeStrategy(String strategyName, ConnectApi.NBAStrategyExecutionInput strategyInput)
executestrategy(string,connectapi.nbastr.description: Execute a strategy using an input class.

strategyinput.name: strategyInput
strategyinput.description: Name of the strategy. A ConnectApi.NBAStrategyExecutionInput body.

getrecommendation(string).name: getRecommendation
getrecommendation(string).overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.Recommendation getRecommendation(String recommendationId)

getrecommendationreaction(string).name: getRecommendationReaction
getrecommendationreaction(string).overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.RecommendationReaction getRecommendationReaction(String reactionId)

getrecommendationreactions(string,string.name: getRecommendationReactions
getrecommendationreactions(string,string.signature: public static ConnectApi.RecommendationReactions getRecommendationReactions(String onBehalfOfId, String createdById, String targetId, String contextRecordId, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize)
getrecommendationreactions(string,string.overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.RecommendationReactions getRecommendationReactions(String onBehalfOfId, String createdById, String targetId, String contextRecordId, Integer pageParam, Integer pageSize)

pagesize.name: pageSize
pagesize.description: Use the ID of the user who is indirectly reacting to the recommendation to filter the results. Use the ID of the user or record that created the recommendation reaction to filter the results. Use the ID of the target to filter the results. Use the ID of a context record to filter the results. Specifies the number of the page you want returned. Starts at 0. If you pass in null or 0, the first page is returned. Specifies the number of items per page. Valid values are from 1 through 100. If you pass in null, the default size is 25.

reaction.name: reaction
reaction.description: A ConnectApi.RecommendationReactionInput object representing a reaction to a recommendation produced by a recommendation strategy.
